short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension by vitwit.com, for real time notifications for any activity on your Ethereum Wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to notify activity of Ethereum Wallet in real time. Add wallet address and get notified transactional activities
